name: Boomoji
description:
(in development) Dash to the finishing line! Using the power of explosions, create a path, overcome obstacles and destroy enemies! The player must get Boomoji to the finishing line -- but be fast as the clock is always ticking in this explosive, fun-to-play, physics games!

created with GDevelop by Riccardo Pilloni

How to Play:

- tap the bomb crate to detonate an explosion to dash the player character

-avoid obstacles on the player path and get it to the finish line.
